name: Aurora Eidolon
text:
{W}, Sacrifice Aurora Eidolon: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Aurora Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.
title: Aurora Eidolon

flavor:
"As peace should be—gentle yet unstoppable."
—Augustin IV
name: Azorius Herald
text:
Azorius Herald can't be blocked.
When Azorius Herald enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
When Azorius Herald enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {U} was spent to cast it.
title: Azorius Herald

name: Beacon Hawk
text:
Flying
Whenever Beacon Hawk deals combat damage to a player, you may untap target creature.
{W}: Beacon Hawk gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
title: Beacon Hawk

flavor: "Before the first stone was laid or the first elf-child born, the power of the nephilim was gathering. Let that power be spread by my hands."
name: Blessing of the Nephilim
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.
title: Blessing of the Nephilim

flavor: Flesh can be tempered by spellcraft and forged ever stronger by the hammers of foes.
name: Brace for Impact
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target multicolored creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
title: Brace for Impact

flavor: Her enemy's strength is her own.
name: Carom
text:
The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to another target creature instead.
Draw a card.
title: Carom

flavor:
"We thought the clouds had moved from the night sky. Then the night sky moved, and the horizon grew wings."
—Josuri
name: Celestial Ancient
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
title: Celestial Ancient

flavor:
"No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now!"
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage
name: Condemn
text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
title: Condemn

flavor: Confront her, and feel the hooves of her steed. Ignore her, and feel the sting of her arrow.
name: Freewind Equenaut
text:
Flying
As long as Freewind Equenaut is enchanted, it has "{T}: Freewind Equenaut deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature."
title: Freewind Equenaut

flavor: The magic of the Guildpact gives aegis to the spirits pressed into its service. Upon entering the afterlife, they find new focus and are charged with defending the Guildpact against those who would see it broken.
name: Guardian of the Guildpact
text: Protection from monocolored
title: Guardian of the Guildpact

flavor: "This aura threatens the sanctity of your soul. Wrenching it free won't be easy on either of us. If you're ready, we'll begin."
name: Haazda Exonerator
text: {T}, Sacrifice Haazda Exonerator: Destroy target Aura.
title: Haazda Exonerator

flavor: The Haazda shield is broad, protecting both the free and the guilded.
name: Haazda Shield Mate
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Haazda Shield Mate unless you pay {W}{W}.
{W}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
title: Haazda Shield Mate

flavor: Some sky steeds break from the thundering herd to ride free on the open winds.
name: Mistral Charger
text: Flying
title: Mistral Charger

name: Paladin of Prahv
text:
Whenever Paladin of Prahv deals damage, you gain that much life.
Forecast — {1}{W}, Reveal Paladin of Prahv from your hand: Whenever target creature deals damage this turn, you gain that much life. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)
title: Paladin of Prahv

name: Proclamation of Rebirth
text:
Return up to three target creature cards with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Forecast — {5}{W}, Reveal Proclamation of Rebirth from your hand: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)
title: Proclamation of Rebirth

flavor: Properly honored dead gain the peace of the grave and freedom from the call of the Ghost Quarter.
name: Proper Burial
text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
title: Proper Burial

flavor: In death, as in life, they protect the Grand Arbiter from exposure to contrary points of view.
name: Soulsworn Jury
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{1}{U}, Sacrifice Soulsworn Jury: Counter target creature spell.
title: Soulsworn Jury

name: Steeling Stance
text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Forecast — {W}, Reveal Steeling Stance from your hand: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)
title: Steeling Stance

flavor: "Life is fleeting, and so is death. Only the oath is eternal."
name: Stoic Ephemera
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
When Stoic Ephemera blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
title: Stoic Ephemera

flavor: "As my father taught, ‘Training will raise your shield to the blow, but courage fills the gaps the shield leaves open.'"
name: Valor Made Real
text: Target creature can block any number of creatures this turn.
title: Valor Made Real

flavor: Its pulsating cry shatters bonds of iron, granite, and servitude.
name: Wakestone Gargoyle
text:
Defender, flying
{1}{W}: Creatures you control with defender can attack this turn as though they didn't have defender.
title: Wakestone Gargoyle

name: Court Hussar
text:
Vigilance
When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {W} was spent to cast it.
title: Court Hussar

name: Cytoplast Manipulator
text:
Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{U}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it for as long as Cytoplast Manipulator remains on the battlefield.
title: Cytoplast Manipulator

name: Enigma Eidolon
text:
{U}, Sacrifice Enigma Eidolon: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Enigma Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.
title: Enigma Eidolon

name: Govern the Guildless
text:
Gain control of target monocolored creature.
Forecast — {1}{U}, Reveal Govern the Guildless from your hand: Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)
title: Govern the Guildless

name: Helium Squirter
text:
Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{1}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains flying until end of turn.
title: Helium Squirter

name: Novijen Sages
text:
Graft 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{1}, Remove two +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control: Draw a card.
title: Novijen Sages

flavor: While the soldier dreams, the eyes stand watch.
name: Ocular Halo
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: Draw a card."
{W}: Enchanted creature gains vigilance until end of turn.
title: Ocular Halo

name: Plaxmanta
text:
Flash
When Plaxmanta enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain shroud until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
When Plaxmanta enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {G} was spent to cast it.
title: Plaxmanta

flavor: "You will do the thinking for the both of us!"
name: Psychic Possession
text:
Enchant opponent
Skip your draw step.
Whenever enchanted opponent draws a card, you may draw a card.
title: Psychic Possession

name: Silkwing Scout
text:
Flying
{G}, Sacrifice Silkwing Scout: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
title: Silkwing Scout

name: Skyscribing
text:
Each player draws X cards.
Forecast — {2}{U}, Reveal Skyscribing from your hand: Each player draws a card. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)
title: Skyscribing

flavor: Every culture has its unlucky numbers. In a city where you're either alone, in a crowd, or being stabbed in the back, two is the worst number of all.
name: Spell Snare
text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 2.
title: Spell Snare

flavor: He unmakes the world in his own image.
name: Tidespout Tyrant
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell, return target permanent to its owner's hand.
title: Tidespout Tyrant

name: Vigean Graftmage
text:
Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{1}{U}: Untap target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.
title: Vigean Graftmage

flavor: "I could see in the other mage's eyes that he'd thought of it too. Then it became a race to exploit the knowledge first."
name: Vision Skeins
text: Each player draws two cards.
title: Vision Skeins

name: Writ of Passage
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, if its power is 2 or less, it can't be blocked this turn.
Forecast — {1}{U}, Reveal Writ of Passage from your hand: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)
title: Writ of Passage

flavor: The Rakdos are unique in designing torture equipment they can operate while "suffering" alongside their victims.
name: Bond of Agony
text:
As an additional cost to cast Bond of Agony, pay X life.
Each other player loses X life.
title: Bond of Agony

flavor: To the Rakdos, the fun is in the shakedown. The loot is usually discarded.
name: Brain Pry
text: Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand. That player discards a card with that name. If he or she can't, you draw a card.
title: Brain Pry

name: Crypt Champion
text:
Double strike
When Crypt Champion enters the battlefield, each player puts a creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from his or her graveyard onto the battlefield.
When Crypt Champion enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {R} was spent to cast it.
title: Crypt Champion

flavor: There came a rush, a sudden fire in the mind. Then the two saw only the sooty fog of madness, heard only the crackling of their last thoughts burning away.
name: Delirium Skeins
text: Each player discards three cards.
title: Delirium Skeins

flavor: They knock 'em dead, with or without the punch line.
name: Demon's Jester
text:
Flying
Hellbent — Demon's Jester gets +2/+1 as long as you have no cards in hand.
title: Demon's Jester

flavor: Like a vulture's scalp, the face of a drekavac is oily and hairless. The filth and disease of its carrion diet slip off its blood-slick skin.
name: Drekavac
text: When Drekavac enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a noncreature card.
title: Drekavac

flavor: Guilds often exterminate those who saw or knew too much. Some vindictive souls retain their knowledge, using it in the afterlife to crush the guilded and the vile bargain that gives them power.
name: Enemy of the Guildpact
text: Protection from multicolored
title: Enemy of the Guildpact

name: Entropic Eidolon
text:
{B}, Sacrifice Entropic Eidolon: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Entropic Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.
title: Entropic Eidolon

name: Infernal Tutor
text:
Reveal a card from your hand. Search your library for a card with the same name as that card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, instead search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
title: Infernal Tutor

flavor:
"All dead move to the hollow rhythm of necromancy."
—Savra
name: Macabre Waltz
text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.
title: Macabre Waltz

flavor:
"I call them ‘Poke' and ‘Prod.'"
—Chagrach, Rakdos cursemage
name: Nettling Curse
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, its controller loses 3 life.
{1}{R}: Enchanted creature attacks this turn if able.
title: Nettling Curse

flavor:
"Please tell me I'm hallucinating. I'd rather be crazy than here."
—Gorev Hadszak, Wojek investigator
name: Nightcreep
text: Until end of turn, all creatures become black and all lands become Swamps.
title: Nightcreep

flavor: "All ends in obliteration—love in hatred, life in death, and light in empty darkness."
name: Nihilistic Glee
text:
{2}{B}, Discard a card: Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Hellbent — {1}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.
title: Nihilistic Glee

flavor: They cut the stitches and give her sips of her brew. Then they sew her up again, and she's back to stirring.
name: Ragamuffyn
text: Hellbent — {T}, Sacrifice a creature or land: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.
title: Ragamuffyn

flavor: An ogre's poisonous stench is like fine Kashkaval cheese to the noses lowest to the ground.
name: Ratcatcher
text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may search your library for a Rat card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
title: Ratcatcher

flavor:
"A basilisk's gaze is effective, but disposing of physical remains is a tiresome task. It's far more discrete to dissolve one's victim entirely."
—Szadek
name: Seal of Doom
text: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
title: Seal of Doom

flavor: A Rakdos party is a flop if anyone lives to talk about it.
name: Slaughterhouse Bouncer
text: Hellbent — When Slaughterhouse Bouncer dies, if you have no cards in hand, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
title: Slaughterhouse Bouncer

name: Slithering Shade
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{B}: Slithering Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Hellbent — Slithering Shade can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as you have no cards in hand.
title: Slithering Shade

flavor:
"The victim bears the marks of the ‘Ktozok Impaler'. . . but he was executed years ago!"
—Gorev Hadszak, Wojek investigator
name: Unliving Psychopath
text:
{B}: Unliving Psychopath gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with power less than Unliving Psychopath's power.
title: Unliving Psychopath

flavor:
"Nature's exceptions remind us not to think in absolutes. Just as the orchid blossoms on blackened stone, so does the gift of mana occasionally manifest in the undead."
—Bougrat, druid of the Cult of Yore
name: Vesper Ghoul
text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
title: Vesper Ghoul

flavor:
"Some images are so powerful that one glance burns them into your mind forever. Come, let us gaze on nothingness."
—Szadek
name: Wit's End
text: Target player discards his or her hand.
title: Wit's End

flavor:
"I like a little entertainment with my dinner."
—Rakdos
name: Cackling Flames
text:
Cackling Flames deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Hellbent — Cackling Flames deals 5 damage to that creature or player instead if you have no cards in hand.
title: Cackling Flames

name: Demonfire
text:
Demonfire deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, Demonfire can't be countered by spells or abilities and the damage can't be prevented.
title: Demonfire

flavor:
"The forward flame-kin are popping. We have incoming!"
—Svar, Boros signaler
name: Flame-Kin War Scout
text: When another creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Flame-Kin War Scout. If you do, Flame-Kin War Scout deals 4 damage to that creature.
title: Flame-Kin War Scout

flavor: A flame-kin is always formidable, but feeding its fire with a sorcerous gift grants it the power to devastate armies.
name: Flaring Flame-Kin
text: As long as Flaring Flame-Kin is enchanted, it gets +2/+2, has trample, and has "{R}: Flaring Flame-Kin gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
title: Flaring Flame-Kin

flavor: Despite its diminutive name, Gnat Alley is the longest street in Ravnica. Mile after twisting mile, it threads its way among the broader, safer thoroughfares like a parasite.
name: Gnat Alley Creeper
text: Gnat Alley Creeper can't be blocked by creatures with flying.
title: Gnat Alley Creeper

flavor:
"A quick step beyond oblivion lies a place so full of thoughts that it leaves no room for your own."
—Quyzl, chronarch prodigy
name: Ignorant Bliss
text: Exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of the next end step, return those cards to your hand, then draw a card.
title: Ignorant Bliss

flavor: Dressed to kill.
name: Kill-Suit Cultist
text:
Kill-Suit Cultist attacks each turn if able.
{B}, Sacrifice Kill-Suit Cultist: The next time damage would be dealt to target creature this turn, destroy that creature instead.
title: Kill-Suit Cultist

flavor: "Start knockin' heads, boys, and don't stop 'til the ragamuffyn sings!"
name: Kindle the Carnage
text: Discard a card at random. If you do, Kindle the Carnage deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature. You may repeat this process any number of times.
title: Kindle the Carnage

flavor: A popular game among ogres is to see how many revolutions a head can make before it pops off.
name: Ogre Gatecrasher
text: When Ogre Gatecrasher enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with defender.
title: Ogre Gatecrasher

flavor:
"Rage, my servants. Our ancient power is renewed in blood."
—Rakdos
name: Psychotic Fury
text:
Target multicolored creature gains double strike until end of turn.
Draw a card.
title: Psychotic Fury

text:
{R}{R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gains flying until end of turn.
{R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Hellbent — Rakdos Pit Dragon has double strike as long as you have no cards in hand.
title: Rakdos Pit Dragon

name: Sandstorm Eidolon
text:
{R}, Sacrifice Sandstorm Eidolon: Target creature can't block this turn.
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Sandstorm Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.

flavor:
"If it breathes, it will burn."
—Rakdos pyromancers' creed
name: Seal of Fire
text: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: Seal of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
title: Seal of Fire

name: Squealing Devil
text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Squealing Devil enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
When Squealing Devil enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {B} was spent to cast it.
title: Squealing Devil

flavor: Something roams the killing places, sniffing the guilt of the slayers, stalking them on iron paws.
name: Stalking Vengeance
text:
Haste
Whenever another creature you control dies, it deals damage equal to its power to target player.
title: Stalking Vengeance

name: Stormscale Anarch
text: {2}{R}, Discard a card at random: Stormscale Anarch deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If the discarded card was multicolored, Stormscale Anarch deals 4 damage to that creature or player instead.
title: Stormscale Anarch

flavor: The taste of blood breaks down what little self-control the Rakdos possess.
name: Taste for Mayhem
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0.
Hellbent — Enchanted creature gets an additional +2/+0 as long as you have no cards in hand.
title: Taste for Mayhem

flavor: He wages war wherever the wind carries him.
name: Utvara Scalper
text:
Flying
Utvara Scalper attacks each turn if able.
title: Utvara Scalper

flavor: Razia, archangel of war, demands total commitment.
name: War's Toll
text:
Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, tap all lands that player controls.
If a creature an opponent controls attacks, all creatures that opponent controls attack if able.
title: War's Toll

flavor:
"Finally, a good use for an Azorius courthouse."
—Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage
name: Weight of Spires
text: Weight of Spires deals damage to target creature equal to the number of nonbasic lands that creature's controller controls.
title: Weight of Spires

flavor:
"It wags its tail when it's happy. It wags its tail when it's angry. Nope, there's no good time to be around a whiptail."
—Rugar, Leaguehall Infirmary patient
name: Whiptail Moloch
text: When Whiptail Moloch enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature you control.
title: Whiptail Moloch

name: Aquastrand Spider
text:
Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{G}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
title: Aquastrand Spider

name: Cytoplast Root-Kin
text:
Graft 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
When Cytoplast Root-Kin enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{2}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto Cytoplast Root-Kin.
title: Cytoplast Root-Kin

name: Cytospawn Shambler
text:
Graft 6 (This creature enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{G}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains trample until end of turn.
title: Cytospawn Shambler

name: Elemental Resonance
text:
Enchant permanent
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add mana equal to enchanted permanent's mana cost to your mana pool. (Mana cost includes color. If a mana symbol has multiple colors, choose one.)
title: Elemental Resonance

name: Fertile Imagination
text: Choose a card type. Target opponent reveals his or her hand. Put two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield for each card of the chosen type revealed this way. (Artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal are card types.)
title: Fertile Imagination

flavor:
"This undemanding vegetation takes root in a mote of dust but grows incredibly quickly."
—Simic research notes
name: Flash Foliage
text:
Cast Flash Foliage only during combat after blockers are declared.
Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield blocking target creature attacking you.
Draw a card.
title: Flash Foliage

flavor:
"An indrik's howl has destructive power much subtler than that of its crushing foot. The sound is mundane, but inaudible vibrations scatter and sunder magical contrivances."
—Simic research notes
name: Indrik Stomphowler
text: When Indrik Stomphowler enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
title: Indrik Stomphowler

flavor: His work determines who is remembered and who feeds the worms.
name: Loaming Shaman
text: When Loaming Shaman enters the battlefield, target player shuffles any number of target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.
title: Loaming Shaman

flavor:
"Send a runner to Tin Street, and tell 'em the delivery has been . . . uh . . . held up."
—Bonmod, caravan rear guard
name: Might of the Nephilim
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each of its colors.
title: Might of the Nephilim

name: Patagia Viper
text:
Flying
When Patagia Viper enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 green and blue Snake creature tokens onto the battlefield.
When Patagia Viper enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {U} was spent to cast it.
title: Patagia Viper

flavor:
"Meat and eggs. We eat!"
—Borborygmos
name: Protean Hulk
text: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total converted mana cost 6 or less and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
title: Protean Hulk

name: Simic Basilisk
text:
Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{1}{G}: Until end of turn, target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat."
title: Simic Basilisk

flavor: Simic initiates begin their training as experimental subjects. Failures are flushed to the undersewers.
name: Simic Initiate
text: Graft 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
title: Simic Initiate

flavor:
"Infused with autochthon blood for size and hellion cells for speed, the ragworm is perfect for clearing the undergardens of both rats and vagrants."
—Yolov, Simic bioengineer
name: Simic Ragworm
text: {U}: Untap Simic Ragworm.
title: Simic Ragworm

name: Sporeback Troll
text:
Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{1}{G}: Regenerate target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.
title: Sporeback Troll

flavor: A hydra tender's problem isn't having enough defenses but enough pots.
name: Sprouting Phytohydra
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Sprouting Phytohydra is dealt damage, you may put a token that's a copy of Sprouting Phytohydra onto the battlefield.
title: Sprouting Phytohydra

flavor:
"Mizzium may be impervious to fire, but obviously certain other things can . . . modify its form."
—Ivos Koba, indrik handler
name: Stomp and Howl
text: Destroy target artifact and target enchantment.
title: Stomp and Howl

flavor: "It takes more than swift feet and dark shadows to slip by me unnoticed."
name: Street Savvy
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and can block creatures with landwalk abilities as though they didn't have those abilities.
title: Street Savvy

flavor: The most successful of Simic creations is cytoplasm, a living, symbiotic substance that feeds off genetic rhythms and strengthens its host in return.
name: Thrive
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target creatures.
title: Thrive

name: Utopia Sprawl
text:
Enchant Forest
As Utopia Sprawl enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of the chosen color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
title: Utopia Sprawl

name: Verdant Eidolon
text:
{G}, Sacrifice Verdant Eidolon: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool.
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Verdant Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.
title: Verdant Eidolon

name: Æthermage's Touch
text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. It gains "At the beginning of your end step, return this creature to its owner's hand." Then put the rest of the cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.
title: Æthermage's Touch

name: Anthem of Rakdos
text:
Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn and Anthem of Rakdos deals 1 damage to you.
Hellbent — As long as you have no cards in hand, if a source you control would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead.
title: Anthem of Rakdos

flavor:
"Show them to Razia and then to the Azorius sky marshals. We could create a fine bidding war—enough to fund the final stages of Project Kraj."
—Momir Vig
name: Assault Zeppelid
text: Flying, trample
title: Assault Zeppelid

flavor: In her single metasphere are bound the records of every Ætheric transaction since the time of Azor.
name: Azorius Æthermage
text: Whenever a permanent is returned to your hand, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
title: Azorius Æthermage

flavor: With a steady diet of lawbreakers, Azorius griffins inevitably develop a resistance to the contraband magic that taints much of their prey.
name: Azorius First-Wing
text: Flying, protection from enchantments
title: Azorius First-Wing

flavor: Azorius military tactics, like their legal tactics, capitalize on delay and nullification.
name: Azorius Ploy
text:
Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
title: Azorius Ploy

flavor: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.
name: Coiling Oracle
text: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.
title: Coiling Oracle

flavor:
"Though highly effective at reshaping flesh, these specially bred cytoplasts leave the subject reeking of omnibian mucus."
—Simic research notes
name: Cytoshape
text: Choose a nonlegendary creature on the battlefield. Target creature becomes a copy of that creature until end of turn.
title: Cytoshape

flavor: A thousand phobias sopped from the city and wrung from Rix Maadi as one.
name: Dread Slag
text:
Trample
Dread Slag gets -4/-4 for each card in your hand.
title: Dread Slag

flavor:
"Of course it will grow beyond control—it was designed to choose its own evolution."
—Momir Vig
name: Experiment Kraj
text:
Experiment Kraj has all activated abilities of each other creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
title: Experiment Kraj

flavor: Lyzolda's pet rats eat better than the average citizen. In fact, they can usually be found eating the average citizen.
name: Gobhobbler Rats
text: Hellbent — As long as you have no cards in hand, Gobhobbler Rats gets +1/+0 and has "{B}: Regenerate Gobhobbler Rats."
title: Gobhobbler Rats

flavor: The Arbiter is a conduit of justice, a will so disciplined that it dispenses justice without ego or remorse.
name: Grand Arbiter Augustin IV
text:
White spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Blue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast.
title: Grand Arbiter Augustin IV

flavor:
"I must speak with Momir Vig about creating a water-spouting watchdog."
—Mathvan, Prahv scrollwarden
name: Hellhole Rats
text:
Haste
When Hellhole Rats enters the battlefield, target player discards a card. Hellhole Rats deals damage to that player equal to that card's converted mana cost.
title: Hellhole Rats

name: Isperia the Inscrutable
text:
Flying
Whenever Isperia the Inscrutable deals combat damage to a player, name a card. That player reveals his or her hand. If he or she reveals the named card, search your library for a creature card with flying, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
title: Isperia the Inscrutable

flavor: Few puppets are so willing.
name: Jagged Poppet
text:
Whenever Jagged Poppet is dealt damage, discard that many cards.
Hellbent — Whenever Jagged Poppet deals combat damage to a player, if you have no cards in hand, that player discards cards equal to the damage.
title: Jagged Poppet

flavor:
"The best experiments are those whose successes replicate themselves."
—Yolov, Simic bioengineer
name: Leafdrake Roost
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{G}{U}, {T}: Put a 2/2 green and blue Drake creature token with flying onto the battlefield."
title: Leafdrake Roost

flavor: Sacrificial rites take place before an audience of cheering cultists, each begging to be the next on stage.
name: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch
text: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch deals 2 damage to target creature or player if the sacrificed creature was red. Draw a card if the sacrificed creature was black.
title: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch

name: Momir Vig, Simic Visionary
text:
Whenever you cast a green creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card and reveal it. If you do, shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever you cast a blue creature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put that card into your hand.
title: Momir Vig, Simic Visionary

flavor:
"This creature has hyperevolved chameleonic abilities. It no longer mimics its surroundings, instead forcing them to take on its form."
—Simic research notes
name: Omnibian
text: {T}: Target creature becomes a Frog with base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.
title: Omnibian

flavor: With one commanding word, the spell was put down and a fine collected for its casting.
name: Overrule
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. You gain X life.
title: Overrule

flavor: The Rakdos make sure their victims remember their pain—or at least give up a little bit of their sanity in order to forget.
name: Pain Magnification
text: Whenever an opponent is dealt 3 or more damage by a single source, that player discards a card.
title: Pain Magnification

name: Palliation Accord
text:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, put a shield counter on Palliation Accord.
Remove a shield counter from Palliation Accord: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
title: Palliation Accord

name: Plaxcaster Frogling
text:
Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
{2}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
title: Plaxcaster Frogling

name: Plumes of Peace
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
Forecast — {W}{U}, Reveal Plumes of Peace from your hand: Tap target creature. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)
title: Plumes of Peace

name: Pride of the Clouds
text:
Flying
Pride of the Clouds gets +1/+1 for each other creature with flying on the battlefield.
Forecast — {2}{W}{U}, Reveal Pride of the Clouds from your hand: Put a 1/1 white and blue Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)
title: Pride of the Clouds

flavor:
"Stay indoors, away from what seeps over the thresholds. This is the Demon's work, and only ill can come of it."
—Belko, owner of Titan's Keg tavern
name: Rain of Gore
text: If a spell or ability would cause its controller to gain life, that player loses that much life instead.
title: Rain of Gore

flavor: "Great minds bleed alike."
name: Rakdos Augermage
text:
First strike
{T}: Reveal your hand and discard a card of target opponent's choice. Then that player reveals his or her hand and discards a card of your choice. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
title: Rakdos Augermage

flavor:
"Our thrulls dissolve from the inside out in a matter of days. Shoddy work, but they're a scream while they last."
—Uzric, Rakdos guildmage
name: Rakdos Ickspitter
text: {T}: Rakdos Ickspitter deals 1 damage to target creature and that creature's controller loses 1 life.
title: Rakdos Ickspitter

name: Rakdos the Defiler
text:
Flying, trample
Whenever Rakdos the Defiler attacks, sacrifice half the non-Demon permanents you control, rounded up.
Whenever Rakdos deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices half the non-Demon permanents he or she controls, rounded up.
title: Rakdos the Defiler

flavor:
"We've bred out the shortcomings of the species' natural form and replaced them with assets of our own design."
—Momir Vig
name: Simic Sky Swallower
text:
Flying, trample
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
title: Simic Sky Swallower

name: Sky Hussar
text:
Flying
When Sky Hussar enters the battlefield, untap all creatures you control.
Forecast — Tap two untapped white and/or blue creatures you control, Reveal Sky Hussar from your hand: Draw a card. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)
title: Sky Hussar

flavor:
"This world may not know peace, but in my presence you will know quiet."
—Augustin IV
name: Swift Silence
text: Counter all other spells. Draw a card for each spell countered this way.
title: Swift Silence

flavor: Held aloft by metabolized magic, trygons are ravenous for sources of mystic fuel.
name: Trygon Predator
text:
Flying
Whenever Trygon Predator deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.
title: Trygon Predator

flavor: They're dying left and right.
name: Twinstrike
text:
Twinstrike deals 2 damage to each of two target creatures.
Hellbent — Destroy those creatures instead if you have no cards in hand.
title: Twinstrike

flavor: Fruits of magic, roots in science.
name: Vigean Hydropon
text:
Graft 5 (This creature enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)
Vigean Hydropon can't attack or block.
title: Vigean Hydropon

name: Vigean Intuition
text: Choose a card type, then reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. (Artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal are card types.)
title: Vigean Intuition

flavor:
"It is technically an ooze, but its lifespan measures only seconds. In that short time, its appetite for magic is extraordinary."
—Simic research notes
name: Voidslime
text: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
title: Voidslime

name: Windreaver
text:
Flying
{W}: Windreaver gains vigilance until end of turn.
{W}: Windreaver gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
{U}: Switch Windreaver's power and toughness until end of turn.
{U}: Return Windreaver to its owner's hand.
title: Windreaver

flavor: Rakdos festivals almost leave enough rubble in their wake to hide the bodies.
name: Wrecking Ball
text: Destroy target creature or land.
title: Wrecking Ball

flavor: Such is the power of Rakdos that even his shadow takes on a cruel life of its own.
name: Avatar of Discord
text:
({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.)
Flying
When Avatar of Discord enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard two cards.
title: Avatar of Discord

name: Azorius Guildmage
text:
{2}{W}: Tap target creature.
{2}{U}: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

flavor:
"Look beyond, to the vascular awareness that all life is a map to greater knowledge."
—Momir Vig, Biomancy, vol. I
name: Biomantic Mastery
text: Draw a card for each creature target player controls, then draw a card for each creature another target player controls.
title: Biomantic Mastery

name: Dovescape
text:
({W/U} can be paid with either {W} or {U}.)
Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, counter that spell. That player puts X 1/1 white and blue Bird creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield, where X is the spell's converted mana cost.
title: Dovescape

flavor: When it takes forever to learn all the rules, no time is left for breaking them.
name: Minister of Impediments
text:
({W/U} can be paid with either {W} or {U}.)
{T}: Tap target creature.
title: Minister of Impediments

name: Rakdos Guildmage
text:
({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.)
{3}{B}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
{3}{R}: Put a 2/1 red Goblin creature token with haste onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

flavor: Most auramancers would have let the spikes hover just above the skin. Having the spikes rip through the skin from beneath was a touch added by Rakdos himself.
name: Riot Spikes
text:
({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.

({G/U} can be paid with either {G} or {U}.)
Enchant creature

text:
({G/U} can be paid with either {G} or {U}.)
{1}{G}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature onto another target creature with the same controller.
{1}{U}: Attach target Aura enchanting a permanent to another permanent with the same controller.

name: Bound
text: Sacrifice a creature. Return up to X cards from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the number of colors that creature was. Exile this card.
title: Bound

name: Determined
text:
Other spells you control can't be countered by spells or abilities this turn.
Draw a card.
title: Determined

name: Crime
text: Put target creature or enchantment card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

name: Punishment
text: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X.
title: Punishment

name: Hide
text: Put target artifact or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library.
title: Hide

name: Seek
text: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
title: Seek

name: Hit
text: Target player sacrifices an artifact or creature. Hit deals damage to that player equal to that permanent's converted mana cost.
title: Hit

name: Run
text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking creature.
title: Run

name: Odds
text: Flip a coin. If it comes up heads, counter target instant or sorcery spell. If it comes up tails, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.
title: Odds

name: Ends
text: Target player sacrifices two attacking creatures.
title: Ends

text: Destroy target multicolored permanent.
title: Pure

name: Simple
text: Destroy all Auras and Equipment.
title: Simple

name: Research
text: Choose up to four cards you own from outside the game and shuffle them into your library.
title: Research

name: Development
text: Put a 3/1 red Elemental creature token onto the battlefield unless any opponent has you draw a card. Repeat this process two more times.
title: Development

name: Rise
text: Return target creature card from a graveyard and target creature on the battlefield to their owners' hands.
title: Rise

name: Fall
text: Target player reveals two cards at random from his or her hand, then discards each nonland card revealed this way.
title: Fall

name: Supply
text: Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.
title: Supply

name: Demand
text: Search your library for a multicolored card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
title: Demand

name: Trial
text: Return all creatures blocking or blocked by target creature to their owner's hand.
title: Trial

name: Error
text: Counter target multicolored spell.
title: Error

text: {1}, {T}: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool.

flavor:
"Ooh, shiny! Let's pull off the chain and take her with us."
—Ukl, Gruul raider, last words
name: Bronze Bombshell
text: When a player other than Bronze Bombshell's owner controls it, that player sacrifices it. If the player does, Bronze Bombshell deals 7 damage to him or her.

text: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{U} to your mana pool.
